center_layout:
<nav>Navigation menu</nav>
<main class="center with-header with-footer">
    <article>
       A centered element with a header and a footer
    </article>
<main>
<footer>Footer area</footer>
aside_layout:
<main>
    <aside>
        Element with auto width
    </aside>
    <section>
        Element that takes the remaining space
    </section>
</main>
buttons:
<button>A standard button</button>
<button class="no-border">A button without a border</button>
<button class="link">A link button</button>
<button class="link accent">An accent colored link button</button>
<button class="link danger">A danger colored link button</button>
<button class="primary">A button with primary color</button>
<button class="accent">A button with accent color</button>
<button class="danger">A button with danger color</button>
links: A standard link An accent colored link A danger colored link A link as a button A link as normal button A link as primary button A link as accent button A link as danger button
input_textarea:
<textarea cols="30" rows="10"></textarea>
<textarea cols="6" rows="3" disabled></textarea>
<textarea cols="6" rows="3" invalid></textarea>
input_select:
<select name="fruits" id="fruit">
      <option value="apple">Apple</option>
      <option value="banana">Banana</option>
      <option value="pineapple">Pineapple</option>
      <option value="cherry">Cherry</option>
</select>
<select name="fruits" id="fruit" disabled>
      <option value="apple">Apple</option>
      <option value="banana">Banana</option>
      <option value="pineapple">Pineapple</option>
      <option value="cherry">Cherry</option>
</select>
input_modifiers:
<input type="text" class="underline" placeholder="Input with underline class" />
<input type="range" disabled />
<input type="number" disabled />
<input type="text" invalid />
<input type="text" invalid="false" />
<input type="button" value="submit" disabled>
labels:
<label>A standard label</label>

<label class="required">Label with required class</label>
<label required>Label with required attribute</label>
<label required="false">Not required label</label>

<label class="disabled">Label with disabled class</label>
<label disabled>Label with disabled attribute</label>
<label disabled="false">Not disabled label</label>

<label class="required" tabindex="0">This is a required field with a tooltip</label>
<label required tabindex="0">This is a required field with a tooltip</label>
<label required tabindex="0" data-tooltip="Custom text">Required label with custom tooltip</label>
